title: Mindbody Founder on Wellness Amid the Pandemic
itunes:title: Mindbody Founder on Wellness Amid the Pandemic
description:
Rick Stollmeyer, Founder and Executive Chair at Mindbody, discusses the importance of wellness amid the pandemic. He points out that the demand for wellness and fitness services continues to rise.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
